BodyName: Committee on Mental Health, Developmental Disability, Alcoholism, Substance Abuse and Disability Services

Items.Title: Resolution condemning the Governor's proposal to close the Bronx Children's Psychiatric Center, the Bronx Psychiatric Center, and three other adult psychiatric centers that serve children and adults with serious and persistent mental disabilities in the City and State of New York.
Items.MatterName: Condemning the Governor's proposal to close psychiatric centers that serve children and adults with serious and persistent mental disabilities.
